document_api_meta.title: Add Showcase Products
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API adds the products to the creator's showcase. The platform will return the add status of the products, and error code and error message if the deletion fails.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The creator access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 1. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a362dccb8030ea6f98c) to get creator access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_body_param.name: add_type
request_body_param.desc:
Specifies how products are added to the showcase. This an enumerated type with values:
- PRODUCT_ID
- PRODUCT_LINK

request_body_param.name: product_ids
request_body_param.desc: A list of product identifiers included if `add_type` is set to `PRODUCT_ID`. The products associated with the identifiers are added to the showcase. Maximum length of the list is 20 product identifiers.

request_body_param.name: product_link
request_body_param.desc: A list of product URLs included if `add_type` is set to `PRODUCT_LINK`. The products associated with the URLs are added to the showcase. Maximum length of the list is 20 product URLs.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^errors
response_param.desc: A list of product showcase addition errors.

response_param.name: ^^message
response_param.example: Encounter network error, please try again.

response_param.name: ^^detail
response_param.desc: Additional detail about the product showcase addition error.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to manage the creator's products within the livestream such as adding, removing, pinning, and unpinning.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to manage the creator's showcase products, including adding, removing and pinning products.
